name: Kindness
body:
### Kindness

A nice way to bootstrap your box (with chef).

### What is it for?
You have RVM for Ruby version management, Brew for package management, kindness for configuration management.

### Installing

    bash < <(curl -s https://raw.github.com/seryl/kindness/master/scripts/kindness-install)

Sets up your brew, ruby and python environments in a sane manner.

### What do I get?

    homebrew, git, rvm, ruby19, chef, Virtualbox, veewee, lunchy

## Also comes with recipes for...

    pip, virtualenv, virturalenvwrapper
